channel.title: Simple Delta Question please take the time to look
channel.description: Ok well i never really caught on to this but could someone please help me with making weapons hit more or less, more powerful or stronger. and follow up with an example please. thanks - Chase

item.title: Simple Delta Question please take the time to look
item.dc:creator: @dragon39990 dragon39990
item.description:
@dragon39990 wrote:

In your source go to “item.CFG” for me its in the config folder.

item = 1323 Iron_scimitar A_vicious,_curved_sword. 99 91.8337125141109 102 2 10 -2 0 0 0 1 0 0 0 9 0

item = 1323 ----is the items ID
Iron_scimitar -----Items name
A_vicious,_curved_sword. ----What you get when you examine it
99 -----Price in shop it buys for
91.8337125141109 ----Price it will sell for
102----High Alch price
------ATTACK BONUS---------
2 ----------Stab bonus
10 —slash bonus
-2 —crush bonus
0 —Magic bonus
0 —Range bonus
----DEFENCE BONUS----
0 —Stab bonus
1 —slash
0 —crush
0 —magic bonus
0 —Range bonus
—OTHER BONUSES----
9 —Strength Bonus
0 —Prayer bonus

~Dragon39990~

Read full topic
